statements: SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, opening_price, closing_price FROM MarketData WHERE id = 1001;
SELECT stock_symbol, high_price, low_price FROM MarketData WHERE date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT id, date, opening_price, closing_price, high_price FROM MarketData WHERE closing_price > 50.00;
SELECT id, opening_price, low_price FROM MarketData WHERE high_price < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT stock_symbol, opening_price, closing_price FROM MarketData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY closing_price ASC
SELECT id, date, high_price FROM MarketData WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND opening_price < 150 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE date = '2022-02-15'
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(high_price) AS avg_high_price FROM MarketData GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(high_price) > 200 ORDER BY avg_high_price DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM historical_market_data ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, date FROM historical_market_data WHERE volume > 10000;
SELECT AVG(close_price) AS average_close_price FROM historical_market_data;
SELECT symbol, prediction FROM trend_analysis WHERE prediction > 0.5;
SELECT date, symbol, close_price, volume FROM historical_market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY close_price DESC
SELECT symbol, AVG(close_price) AS avg_price FROM historical_market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(close_price) > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT symbol, trend, prediction FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend = 'UP' AND prediction > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, MAX(close_price) AS max_price FROM historical_market_data GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY max_price DESC
SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT analysis_date, symbol, trend_type FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, symbol, predicted_price FROM forecasts ORDER BY predicted_price DESC;
SELECT date, symbol, open_price, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND close_price > 1500 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT symbol, trend_type, analysis_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_type IN ('bullish', 'bearish') ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT forecast_date, symbol, predicted_price FROM forecasts WHERE predicted_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, high_price, low_price FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND symbol = 'AMZN';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, close_price, date FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM market_data WHERE open_price > 100 AND date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, date, trend FROM market_analysis WHERE confidence_level > 80;
SELECT news_headline, source FROM market_news WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY news_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, date, high_price, low_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol='AAPL' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT symbol, trend, forecasted_price, confidence_level FROM market_analysis WHERE confidence_level > 70 ORDER BY forecasted_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, news_headline, news_date, source FROM market_news WHERE source='CNN' ORDER BY news_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, date, performance_index, volume FROM market_performance WHERE volume > 1000000 ORDER BY performance_index DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, close_price, volume FROM MarketData WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM CompanyInformation ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT date, value, change_percent FROM MarketIndices WHERE index_name = 'S&P 500' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM UserActivity WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM MarketData WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND close_price > open_price;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM CompanyInformation WHERE founded_date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT index_name, value, change_percent FROM MarketIndices WHERE date = '2022-03-15' ORDER BY change_percent DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM UserActivity WHERE date = '2022-04-20' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
